bibl.title: 'Your Name Will Reach the Hall of the Western Mountains': Some Aspects of Mummy Portrait Inscriptions.
bibl.note: Extensively revised and expanded version of: The Dating of 'Fayum' Mummy Portraits: A Papyrological Perspective, Proceedings of the 20th International Congress of Papyrologists (Copenhagen, 1994) pp. 578-581 et pll. 31-33. - 1. Dating. - 2. Funerary practices and beliefs. - 3. Conclusions.

bibl.title: Archaeological Research in Roman Egypt. The Proceedings of The Seventeenth Classical Colloquium of The Department of Greek and Roman Antiquities, British Museum, held on 1-4 December, 1993

bibl.seg: MONTSERRAT Dominic, 'Your Name Will Reach the Hall of the Western Mountains': Some Aspects of Mummy Portrait Inscriptions.

Archaeological Research in Roman Egypt. The Proceedings of The Seventeenth Classical Colloquium of The Department of Greek and Roman Antiquities, British Museum, held on 1-4 December, 1993 = JRA. Supplementary Series. 19 (Ann Arbor, Michigan, 1996) pp. 177-185, 1 tabl.

Extensively revised and expanded version of: The Dating of 'Fayum' Mummy Portraits: A Papyrological Perspective, Proceedings of the 20th International Congress of Papyrologists (Copenhagen, 1994) pp. 578-581 et pll. 31-33. - 1. Dating. - 2. Funerary practices and beliefs. - 3. Conclusions.
